info.name: Luuk Geelen
info.title: Luuk Geelen | Back End Python Engineer
info.description: Luuk Geelen's personal website, portfolio, blog, tutorials, and just cool stuff
info.keywords: resume, blog, porfolio, tutorials, online courses, luuk geelen

bio.about: Hi! I am Luuk, a self-taught programmer. Started by using Python for healthcare focussed Machine and Deep Learning projects. I currently focus on the development of web applications. Creating meaningful and fun projects for everyone to enjoy is what motivates me to keep creating and learning!

projects.name: Smart Tender Analytics Tool
projects.description: Work in progress. Goal: Web application enabling consultants to automatically write and instantly give feedback to clients, regarding their tender.

projects.name: Automatic Liver Segmentation Using Deep Learning
projects.description: Minor Project. Researching the use of self-attention mechanisms for the segmentation of the liver in CT scans.

projects.name: Stroke Detection Using Machine Learning
projects.description: Graduation Project. Focussing on stroke detection using Graph Convolutional Neural Networks

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Building a responsive website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, showcasing my skills and previous work.

projects.name: Study of the Funding Landscape of Digital Health Innovations
projects.description: Market landscape study of the digital health funding landscape.
